about two weeks ago halfway into the final semester of my undergraduate career I withdrew from a class for the very first time PERIOD It probably sounds a little absurd even dramatic.. PERIOD

Last Monday WSN published an oped by NYU student Ryan Moon titled Struggling to Define AsianAmerican in . i experienced a sense of indignation as I read Moons claim.. PERIOD
